00033     typedef struct _OMax_render 
00034     {
00035         t_object        ob;                     
00036         t_symbol*       oname;          
00037         t_symbol*       dataname;       
00038         bool            obound;         
00039         O_DataType      datatype;       
00040         int                     nbcoeffs;

00086     int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00087     {   
00088         t_class *c;
00089         
00090         c = class_new("OMax.render", (method)OMax_render_new, (method)OMax_render_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_render), 
00091                       0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00092         
00093         // assistance
00094         class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00095         
00096         // input methods
00097         class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_read,"int", A_LONG, 0);
00098         class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_readid,"in1", A_LONG, 0);
00099         class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_setname, "set", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00100         class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_phrases, "phrases",0);
00101         
00102         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00103         OMax_render_class = c;
00104         
00105         return 0;
00106     }

00113     void *OMax_render_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00114     {
00115         t_OMax_render *x = NULL;
00116         
00117         if ((x = (t_OMax_render *)object_alloc(OMax_render_class)))
00118         {
00119             // allocation
00120             char err;
00121             long i = 0;
00122             atom_alloc_array(MAX_EXTRAS, &i, &x->twout, &err);
00123             if (!err || i!=MAX_EXTRAS)
00124                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Allocation error");
00125             
00126             x->extraslist = new list<float>();
00127             x->extrastab = (float*)malloc((MAX_EXTRAS)*sizeof(float));
00128             
00129             x->coefout = NULL;
00130             x->coeflist = NULL;
00131             x->coeftab = NULL;
00132             
00133             // inlets
00134             x->in_ms = intin(x,1);
00135             
00136             // outlets
00137             x->out_statenb = intout(x); // rightmost
00138             x->out_add = outlet_new(x,NULL);
00139             x->out_beat = listout(x);
00140             x->out_sectphr = listout(x);
00141             x->out_buf = listout(x);
00142             x->out_data = outlet_new(x,NULL);
00143             x->out_bang= bangout(x);
00144             
00146             x->obound = FALSE;
00147             if (argc > 0)
00148             {
00149                 if (argv->a_type != A_SYM)
00150                     object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of an existing Oracle)");
00151                 else
00152                     x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00153             }
00154             else
00155                 x->oname = NULL;
00156             
00157             // color
00158             t_object *box;
00159             t_jrgba colorvals;
00160             jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00161             object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00162             jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00163         }
00164         return (x);
00165     }
00166     
00169     void OMax_render_free(t_OMax_render *x)
00170     {
00171         sysmem_freeptr(x->twout);
00172         if (x->coefout)
00173             sysmem_freeptr(x->coefout);
00174         if (x->coeflist)
00175             delete x->coeflist;
00176         if (x->coeftab)
00177             free(x->coeftab);
00178     }
00179     
00182     void OMax_render_assist(t_OMax_render *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00183     {
00184         switch (io)
00185         {
00186             case 1: // inlets
00187                 switch (index)
00188             {
00189                 case 0: // leftmost
00190                     sprintf(s, "index to read, set [symbol] changes sequence to read");
00191                     break;
00192                 case 1:
00193                     sprintf(s, "ID(bufferef) to read");
00194                     break;
00195             }
00196                 break;
00197             case 2: // outlets
00198                 switch (index)
00199             {
00200                 case 0:
00201                     sprintf(s, "bang when done");
00202                     break;
00203                 case 1: // leftmost
00204                     sprintf(s, "data");
00205                     break;
00206                 case 2:
00207                     sprintf(s, "ID (bufferef) & Duration");
00208                     break;
00209                 case 3:
00210                     sprintf(s, "Section & Phrase #");
00211                     break;
00212                 case 4:
00213                     sprintf(s, "[f,f,i,i] Beat info");
00214                     break;
00215                 case 5:
00216                     sprintf(s, "Additional data");
00217                     break;
00218                 case 6:
00219                     sprintf(s, "index");
00220                     break;
00221             }
00222                 break;
00223         }
00224     }

00233     t_symbol * OMax_render_name(t_symbol * oname)
00234     {
00235         char dataname[128];
00236         strcpy(dataname,oname->s_name);
00238         strcat(dataname,"_data");
00239         return gensym(dataname);
00240     }
00241     
00244     bool OMax_render_bind(t_OMax_render *x)
00245     {
00247         if (x->obound == FALSE)
00248         {
00250             if (x->oname)
00251             {
00252             x->dataname = OMax_render_name(x->oname);
00253             if ((x->dataname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->dataname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.data")))
00254             {
00255                 x->data = &(((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->data);
00256                 // If binding is ok, then don't do it next time.
00257                 x->obound = TRUE;
00259                 x->datatype = ((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->datatype;
00260                 if (x->datatype == SPECTRAL) // allocate memory for the output
00261                 {
00262                     x->nbcoeffs = ((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->nbcoeffs;
00263                     // allocation for coeff output
00264                     x->coeflist = new list<float>(x->nbcoeffs);
00265                     x->coeftab = (float*)malloc((x->nbcoeffs)*sizeof(float));
00266                     char err;
00267                     long i = 0;
00268                     atom_alloc_array(x->nbcoeffs, &i, &x->coefout, &err);
00269                     if (!err || i!=x->nbcoeffs)
00270                         object_error((t_object*)x, "Allocation error");
00271                 }
00272                 if (x->datatype == MIDI) // allocate memory for the output
00273                 {
00274                     char err;
00275                     long i = 0;
00276                     atom_alloc_array(6, &i, &x->coefout, &err);
00277                     if (!err || i<6)
00278                         object_error((t_object*)x, "Allocation error");
00279                 }
00280             }
00281             else
00282             {
00283                 object_error((t_object *)x,"No data for Oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00284             }
00285             }
00286             else
00287                 object_error((t_object*)x, "No data name given");
00288         }
00289         return x->obound;
00290     }

00300     void OMax_render_setname(t_OMax_render *x, t_symbol *s)
00301     {
00302         x->oname = s;
00303         x->obound = FALSE;
00304         OMax_render_bind(x);
00305     }
00306     
00310     void OMax_render_read(t_OMax_render *x, long statnb)
00311     {
00312         if (OMax_render_bind(x)&&(x->dataname->s_thing))
00313         {
00314             ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00315             if(!(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag))
00316             {
00317                 if (x->data && (statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->data->get_size())))
00318                 {
00319                     O_label * labL = (*x->data)[statnb];
00320                     
00321                     // state number
00322                     outlet_int(x->out_statenb, labL->get_statenb()); // output
00323                     
00324                     // extras
00325                     *x->extraslist = labL->get_extras();
00326                     int l = 0;
00327                     list<float>::iterator it;
00328                     for(it=x->extraslist->begin();it!=x->extraslist->end();it++)
00329                     {
00330                         x->extrastab[l]=(*it);
00331                         l++;
00332                     }
00333                     atom_setfloat_array(l, x->twout, l, x->extrastab);
00334                     outlet_list(x->out_add, NULL,l, x->twout); // then output coeffs
00335                     
00336                     
00337                     // beat info
00338                     atom_setfloat(x->twout, labL->get_tempo());
00339                     atom_setfloat(x->twout+1, labL->get_phase());
00340                     atom_setlong(x->twout+2, labL->get_binfo1());
00341                     atom_setlong(x->twout+3, labL->get_binfo2());
00342                     outlet_list(x->out_beat, NULL, 4, x->twout); // output             
00343                     
00344                     // section & phrase
00345                     atom_setlong(x->twout, labL->get_section());
00346                     atom_setlong(x->twout+1, labL->get_phrase());
00347                     outlet_list(x->out_sectphr, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00348                     
00349                     // date & duration
00350                     atom_setlong(x->twout, labL->get_bufferef());
00351                     atom_setlong(x->twout+1, labL->get_duration());
00352                     outlet_list(x->out_buf, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00353                     
00354                     // data
00355                     switch(x->datatype)
00356                     {
00357                         case LETTERS:
00358                         {
00359                             t_symbol * symout;
00360                             char carout[2];
00361                             *carout = ((O_char*)labL)->get_letter();
00362                             *(carout+1) = '\0';
00363                             symout = gensym(carout);
00364                             outlet_anything(x->out_data, symout,0,NULL); // output
00365                             break;
00366                         }
00367                         case PITCH:
00368                         {
00369                             atom_setlong(x->twout, ((O_pitch*)labL)->get_pitch());
00370                             atom_setlong(x->twout+1, ((O_pitch*)labL)->get_velocity());
00371                             outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00372                             break;
00373                         }
00374                         case SPECTRAL:
00375                         {
00376                             outlet_int(x->out_data, ((O_spectral*)labL)->get_pitch()); // output pitch first
00377                             *x->coeflist = ((O_spectral*)labL)->get_coeffs();
00378                             list<float>::iterator it = x->coeflist->begin();
00379                             int coefi;
00380                             for (coefi = 0; coefi< x->nbcoeffs; coefi++)
00381                             {
00382                                 x->coeftab[coefi] = (*it);
00383                                 it ++;
00384                             }
00385                             atom_setfloat_array(x->nbcoeffs, x->coefout, x->nbcoeffs, x->coeftab);
00386                             outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL,x->nbcoeffs, x->coefout); // then output coeffs
00387                             break;
00388                         }
00389                         case MIDI:
00390                         {
00391                             // output notes of the slice
00392                             list<O_MIDI_note> notes = ((O_MIDI*)labL)->get_notes();
00393                             list<O_MIDI_note>::iterator notit;
00394                             atom_setsym(x->coefout, gensym("note"));
00395                             for (notit=notes.begin();notit!=notes.end();notit++)
00396                             {
00397                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+1, notit->get_pitch());
00398                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+2, notit->get_velocity());
00399                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+3, notit->get_channel());
00400                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+4, notit->get_offset());
00401                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+5, notit->get_duration());
00402                                 outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL,6, x->coefout); // then output coeffs
00403                             }
00404                             
00405                             // output slice data
00406                             atom_setsym(x->coefout, gensym("slice"));
00407                             atom_setlong(x->coefout+1, notes.size());
00408                             atom_setfloat(x->coefout+2, ((O_MIDI*)labL)->get_vpitch());
00409                             atom_setfloat(x->coefout+3, ((O_MIDI*)labL)->get_mvelocity());
00410                             outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL, 4, x->coefout); // output
00411                             
00412                             break;
00413                         }
00414                     }
00415                     outlet_bang(x->out_bang);
00416                 }
00417                 //else
00418                 //object_post((t_object *)x,"State %ld outside Oracles bounds", statnb, x->oname->s_name);
00419             }
00420             else
00421                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Data of Oracle %s busy",x->oname->s_name);
00422             ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00423         }
00424     }
00425     
00429     void OMax_render_readid(t_OMax_render *x, long idin)
00430     {
00431         int statenb = 0;
00432         if (OMax_render_bind(x)&&(x->dataname->s_thing))
00433         {
00434             ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00435             if(!(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag))
00436             {
00437                 statenb = x->data->get_state(idin);
00438                 if (statenb>0)
00439                     OMax_render_read(x,statenb);
00440             }
00441             else
00442                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Data of Oracle %s busy",x->oname->s_name);
00443             ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00444         }
00445     }
00446     
00451     void OMax_render_phrases(t_OMax_render *x)
00452     {
00453         if (OMax_render_bind(x))
00454         {
00455             ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00456             if(!(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag))
00457             {
00458                 int i,size = x->data->get_size();
00459                 int phrase = 0;//section = 0;
00460                 O_label * finger;
00461                 for (i=0; i<size; i++)
00462                 {
00463                     finger = (*x->data)[i];
00464                     if (finger->get_phrase()!= phrase) 
00465                     {   
00466                         // output state number
00467                         outlet_int(x->out_statenb, finger->get_statenb()); // output
00468                         
00469                         // output date
00470                         atom_setlong(x->twout, finger->get_bufferef());
00471                         outlet_list(x->out_buf, NULL, 1, x->twout); // output
00472                         
00473                         // output section & phrase
00474                         atom_setlong(x->twout, finger->get_section());
00475                         atom_setlong(x->twout+1, finger->get_phrase());
00476                         outlet_list(x->out_sectphr, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00477                         
00478                         // update phrase & section
00479                         phrase = finger->get_phrase();
00480                         //section = section;
00481                     }
00482                 }
00483                 outlet_bang(x->out_bang);
00484             }
00485             else
00486                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Data of Oracle %s busy",x->oname->s_name);
00487             ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00488         }
00489         
00490     }
00492 }
